metric_definitions.name: Per Frame Foreground Object Placement Info
metric_definitions.description: Reports the world position, scale, rotation, and label id of objects carrying a ForegroundObjectMetricReporterTag component.

metric_definitions.name: Per Frame Lighting Info
metric_definitions.description: Reports the enabled state, intensity, colour, and rotation of lights carrying a LightingInfoMetricReporterTag component.

metric_definitions.name: Per Frame Camera Post Processing Info
metric_definitions.description: Reports post-processing effects of cameras (or other objects with a Volume) carrying a CameraPostProcessingMetricReporter component.

metric_definitions.name: random-seed
metric_definitions.description: The random seed used to initialize the random state of the simulation. Only triggered once per simulation.

metric_definitions.name: object count
metric_definitions.description: Counts of objects for each label in the sensor's view

metric_definitions.name: rendered object info
metric_definitions.description: Information about each labeled object visible to the sensor
